properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(POST_NO) COUNT FROM LIKE_POST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT L.POST_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,TITLE ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,COUNT ,POST_DATE FROM LIKE_POST L JOIN MEMBER M ON(L.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN POST P ON(L.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON(P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE L.MEMBER_NO = ?
